issue.title: [CF 1007] Conditions - Stack count slider
issue.body:
When you want to make an icon with a condition that Stagger (http://www.wowhead.com/spell=124275) has a least a specific value, it is pretty time consuming because you have to scroll until 2000 (for example). Could you please make it a text field so you can just enter the stack count.


> Posted by CurseForge user Skudnfroodie | Imported from CurseForge issue #1007 | Raw
